Rules:
1. Each player is assigned a corner at the beginning of the game.
2. Players take turns filling their tiles with one of 6 colors in an attempt to capture adjacent tiles of the same color.
3. You cannot change the color to yours or your opponent\'s.
4. The game ends when there are no tiles left to capture.


Goal:
The goal of the game is to capture more tiles than your opponent, then you win.
